name: HotPuzzle:Video
detailed_description:
HotPuzzle: Video is a video jigsaw puzzle

Unlike previous games, HotPuzzle: Video requires you to spell out dynamic videos, which is much more difficult.

But they are all the most pure hot beauty videos.



The game includes:

15 checkpoints
15 Beauty Videos
Three Wonderful Musics




Feel the fun of HotPuzzle: Video

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 4170 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Puzzle games, pictures will contain sexy beauty pictures, pictures have some sexual hints, but do not contain other dew points and pornographic content.
